TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TaskTrackingStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: The task adherence or completion status represented by this tracking entry.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Health.ItemTypes.ActionPlans.TaskTrackingStatus Completion = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The user completed a task by performing all required occurrences.
Docs.remarks: For example, if the task is to exercise for thirty minutes three times a week, then when the user completes all three exercise sessions a with status Completion will be logged.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Health.ItemTypes.ActionPlans.TaskTrackingStatus NonOccurrence = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The user failed to perform the task.
Docs.remarks: For example, if the user forgot to take their medication or didn't exercise, the application can optionally record this as a with status NonOccurrence.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Health.ItemTypes.ActionPlans.TaskTrackingStatus Occurrence = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The user performed a task at the required time.
Docs.remarks: For example, if the task is to exercise for thirty minutes three times a week, then every time the user completes a thirty-minute exercise session a with status Occurrence will be logged.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Health.ItemTypes.ActionPlans.TaskTrackingStatus OutOfWindow = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The user performed a task, but not at the required time, so it doesn't count toward task completion.
Docs.remarks: For example, if the task is to take medication at 10:00 plus/minus fifteen minutes, and the user takes medication at 12:00, a with status OutOfWindow will be logged.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Health.ItemTypes.ActionPlans.TaskTrackingStatus Unknown = int32(0)

Docs.remarks: This is not a supported value and should not be used to set a property value.
